com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.options

Class Explorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.options.Explorer

  • public class Explorer
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
    The explorer option allows users to pan and zoom Google charts. explorer: {} provides the default explorer behavior, enabling users to pan horizontally and vertically by dragging, and to zoom in and out by scrolling. This feature is experimental and may change in future releases.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Explorer() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Explorer create()
      Default constructor.
      void setActions(String... actions)
      Sets available actions.
      We recommend using ExplorerAction.RIGHT_CLICK_TO_RESET whenever ExplorerAction.DRAG_TO_ZOOM is used.
      See setMaxZoomIn(double), setMaxZoomOut(double), setZoomDelta(double), for zoom customizations.
      void setAxis(ExplorerAxis explorerAxis)
      Limits explorer panning to horizontal or vertical.
      void setKeepInBounds(boolean keepInBounds)
      By default, users can pan all around, regardless of where the data is.
      void setMaxZoomIn(double maxZoomIn)
      The maximum that the explorer can zoom in.
      void setMaxZoomOut(double maxZoomOut)
      The maximum that the explorer can zoom out.
      void setZoomDelta(double zoomDelta)
      When users zoom in or out determines how much they zoom by.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static Explorer create()
        Default constructor.
        Returns:
        a new object instance

      • setActions

        public final void setActions(String... actions)
        Sets available actions.
        We recommend using ExplorerAction.RIGHT_CLICK_TO_RESET whenever ExplorerAction.DRAG_TO_ZOOM is used.
        See setMaxZoomIn(double), setMaxZoomOut(double), setZoomDelta(double), for zoom customizations.
        Parameters:
        actions -

      • setAxis

        public final void setAxis(ExplorerAxis explorerAxis)
        Limits explorer panning to horizontal or vertical. By default, users can pan both horizontally and vertically when the explorer option is used.
        Parameters:
        explorerAxis -

      • setKeepInBounds

        public final void setKeepInBounds(boolean keepInBounds)
        By default, users can pan all around, regardless of where the data is. To ensure that users don't pan beyond the original chart set this to true.
        Parameters:
        keepInBounds -

      • setMaxZoomIn

        public final void setMaxZoomIn(double maxZoomIn)
        The maximum that the explorer can zoom in. By default, users will be able to zoom in enough that they'll see only 25% of the original view. Setting 0.5 would let users zoom in only far enough to see half of the original view.
        Parameters:
        maxZoomIn - default is 0.25

      • setMaxZoomOut

        public final void setMaxZoomOut(double maxZoomOut)
        The maximum that the explorer can zoom out. By default, users will be able to zoom out far enough that the chart will take up only 1/4 of the available space. Setting to 8 would let users zoom out far enough that the chart would take up only 1/8 of the available space.
        Parameters:
        maxZoomOut - default is 4

      • setZoomDelta

        public final void setZoomDelta(double zoomDelta)
        When users zoom in or out determines how much they zoom by. The smaller the number, the smoother and slower the zoom.
        Parameters:
        zoomDelta - default is 1.5
